welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mabitac, a charming town known for its rich history and breathtaking natural beauty. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer and hope you enjoy your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it primarily serves international flights for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at the airport, serving both domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves domestic flights for smaller airlines.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device per day.
